question: How do I conduct initial stakeholder interviews for requirements analysis?
context: Initial Stakeholder Interviews - @ProductOwner conducts interviews Domain Storytelling Sessions - Capture business processes User Story Map Creation - Define user journeys and prioritize features BRD Draft Creation - Document business requirements

question: What are the deliverables of the Domain Modeling phase?
context: EventStorming session documentation in .ai/requirements/ Identified aggregates and domain events Initial technical constraints identified

question: How do I create a Technical Requirements Specification (TRS)?
context: TRS Creation - @Architect creates technical requirements specification API Design - Define REST endpoints and message contracts Data Architecture - Design database schema and relationships

question: What activities are involved in requirements validation?
context: Cross-Document Review - Validate BRD â†” TRS alignment Technical Review - @Architect, @Backend, @Frontend review technical specs Business Review - @ProductOwner validates business requirements

question: How do I facilitate an EventStorming Big Picture session?
context: EventStorming Big Picture - @ProductOwner facilitates with all participants Process Level Deep Dive - Identify commands, events, aggregates Design Level Technical Modeling - Define read models and policies

question: What is the role of @Architect in technical specification?
context: @Architect leads technical validation TRS Creation API Design Data Architecture Integration Points Identify external system interactions

question: How do I handle requirements change requests?
context: Requirements change rate < 10% during development Business conflicts - @ProductOwner manages scope boundaries Technical issues - @Architect leads impact analysis

question: What quality gates exist in the requirements process?
context: Phase Exit Criteria Quality Metrics Process Metrics Success Criteria

question: How do I measure requirements quality?
context: Requirements Completeness Score > 95% Requirements Testability Score > 90% Business-Technical Alignment Score > 90%

question: What is the timeline for requirements analysis phases?
context: Phase 1: Requirements Capture (1-2 days) Phase 2: Domain Modeling (2-3 days) Phase 3: Technical Specification (3-5 days) Phase 4: Requirements Validation (1-2 days) Phase 5: User Story Refinement (2-3 days)
